source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from ADF_CONFIG.DM_MetadataDetails where TargetSchema like '%Test1'

text.value:
Insert into [ADF_CONFIG].[Audit_Data_Migration_Run_Stats] 
(PipelineName, PipelineRunId, ActivityRunId, ActivityType, StatusCode, ExecutionStatus,
 error, ExecutionStartTime, ExecutionEndTime,
DataBaseName, SchemaName, ObjectName, SourceQuery, TargetSchema, dataRead_bytes, dataWritten_bytes, 
sourcePeakConnections, rowsRead, rowsCopied, copyDuration_sec, throughput_kbps)
( Select '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').PipelineRunId}',
  '@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ActivityRunId}', 
'Poly Base' ,
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').StatusCode}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionStatus}', 
'@{replace(string(activity('Ingest into Synapse').Error),'''','')}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionStartTime}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionEndTime}',
'@{item().DataBaseName}', '@{item().SchemaName}', '@{item().ObjectName}',
'@{item().SourceQuery}',  '@{item().TargetSchema}',
 '@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.dataRead}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.dataWritten}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.sourcePeakConnections}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.rowsRead}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.rowsCopied}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.copyDuration}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').output.throughput}')

 error, ExecutionStartTime, ExecutionEndTime,
DataBaseName, SchemaName, ObjectName, SourceQuery, TargetSchema, dataRead_bytes, dataWritten_bytes, 
sourcePeakConnections, rowsRead, rowsCopied, copyDuration_sec, throughput_kbps)
( Select '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').PipelineRunId}',
  '@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ActivityRunId}', 
'Poly Base' ,
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').StatusCode}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionStatus}', 
'@{replace(string(activity('Ingest into Synapse').Error),'''','')}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionStartTime}', 
'@{activity('Ingest into Synapse').ExecutionEndTime}',
'@{item().DataBaseName}', '@{item().SchemaName}', '@{item().ObjectName}',
'@{item().SourceQuery}',  '@{item().TargetSchema}',
 '',
 '',
 '',
 '',
 '',
 '',
 '')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [DataBaseName]
      ,[SchemaName]
      ,[ObjectName]
      ,[TargetSchema]
      ,[LastGeneratedTime]
      ,[objecttype]
      ,[IsStructureMigrated]
      ,[Environment]
      ,[IsDataMigrated]
  FROM [DW_POC].[PEOPLETECH].[MetadataDetails] Where upper(objecttype) like 'TABLE%' and IsStructureMigrated = 1 and Environment = 'synapse'
  and ObjectName  in ('FACT_ENROLLMENT','DIM_ENROLLMENT_DETAIL')

SELECT [DataBaseName]
      ,[SchemaName]
      ,[ObjectName]
      ,[TargetSchema]
      ,[LastGeneratedTime]
      ,[objecttype]
      ,[IsStructureMigrated]
      ,[Environment]
      ,[IsDataMigrated]
  FROM [DW_POC].[PEOPLETECH].[MetadataDetails] Where upper(objecttype) like 'TABLE%' and IsStructureMigrated = 1 and Environment = 'synapse'
  and ObjectName  in ('STATUS_HISTORY','PinAudit','ODS_SURVEY','FACT_ENROLLMENT','DIM_ENROLLMENT_DETAIL',
'Perilcoverage') order by objectname

SELECT [DataBaseName]
      ,[SchemaName]
      ,[ObjectName]
      ,[TargetSchema]
      ,[LastGeneratedTime]
      ,[objecttype]
      ,[IsStructureMigrated]
      ,[Environment]
      ,[IsDataMigrated]
  FROM [DW_POC].[PEOPLETECH].[MetadataDetails] Where upper(objecttype) like 'TABLE%' and IsStructureMigrated = 1 and Environment = 'synapse'
  and ObjectName  in ('FACT_PERSIST_MOBILE_COVERAGE')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select '[' + TABLE_SCHEMA + '].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']' as srcTable, '[' + TABLE_CATALOG + '_' + TABLE_SCHEMA + '].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']' as destTable 
from information_schema.tables where table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
